data.text:
Sunday night is Game of Thrones night! üî• ‚öîÔ∏è ‚ùÑÔ∏è

If you find yourself missing the cast, here‚Äôs a list of movies (and some television series) with three or more Game of Thrones actors.

The list was made using a dataset I‚Äôve been building and theimdbapi üëè, and I‚Äôd have loved to use the guidebox API to tell you where to watch each, but it‚Äôs enterprise only at the moment üëé. Note: I‚Äôll plan to update this list at the end of Season 8.

Code to build this list is on github, and a description of this project is elsewhere on Medium. Comments and suggestions are welcome on github, here, or by email.
